    (Frequently Asked Questions)

    TalentUp Africa is simple and easy to use. Simply download the Mobile app on the play store or log-on to our website to start the next launch to your career.

    No, TUA is completely free for all job seekers and youths looking to kick start thier career. We are 100% positive about helping you be the best you can.

    TUA has built a system that caters for every senario. Either as a fresh school leaving student or an established individual. You can simply create a Resume in simple steps and get started immediately.
